PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SolidStratumComposition
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties expressing the composition of a stratum using volume measures, implementing ISO14688 Part 2 Table 1 Primary fractions and composite fractions. Regional and National conventions should be captured through classification and specific property sets. Zero values may be omitted.

PropertyDef.Name: AirVolume
PropertyDef.Definition: Relative volume of air stratum constituents.

PropertyDef.Name: BouldersVolume
PropertyDef.Definition: Relative volume of boulders (typically larger than 200mm) stratum constituents.

PropertyDef.Name: ClayVolume
PropertyDef.Definition: Relative volume of clay (typically smaller than 0.002mm) stratum constituents.

PropertyDef.Name: CobblesVolume
PropertyDef.Definition: Relative volume of cobbles (typically larger than 63mm) stratum constituents.

PropertyDef.Name: ContaminantVolume
PropertyDef.Definition: Relative volume of contaminant stratum constituents.

PropertyDef.Name: FillVolume
PropertyDef.Definition: Relative volume of fill (controlled placement of anthropogenic soil) stratum constituents.

PropertyDef.Name: GravelVolume
PropertyDef.Definition: Relative volume of gravel (typically larger than 2mm) stratum constituents.

PropertyDef.Name: OrganicVolume
PropertyDef.Definition: Relative volume of organic (peat/humus) stratum constituents especially soil.

PropertyDef.Name: RockVolume
PropertyDef.Definition: Relative volume of rock stratum constituents.

PropertyDef.Name: SandVolume
PropertyDef.Definition: Relative volume of sand (typically smaller than 2mm) stratum constituents.

PropertyDef.Name: SiltVolume
PropertyDef.Definition: Relative volume of silt (typically smaller than 0.063mm) stratum constituents.

PropertyDef.Name: WaterVolume
PropertyDef.Definition: Relative volume of water stratum constituents.

PropertyDef.Name: CompositeFractions
PropertyDef.Definition: Denomination into soil groups by composite fractions
